alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 11 at 1:31PM PDT until August 11 at 4:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Inyo County in south central California... * Until 430 PM PDT. * At 131 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated a thunderstorm producing heavy rain along Highway 168, east of Westgard Pass. Additional showers and thunderstorms could move over the same area through 430 pm. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Highway 168 between Westgard Pass and Deep Springs Valley. This includes the following roads... State Route 168 between mile markers 29 and 44. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
